每拥有1个生存词条，植物拥有{value}%减伤，激活庇佑效果: For each Vitalis modifier, plants gain {value}% damage reduction and the Blessing effect is activated.
植物出场时获得{value}点护盾: Plants gain {value} points of shield on appearance.
拥有护盾的植物，拥有{value}%减伤: Plants with shields gain {value}% damage reduction.
植物受伤时获得{value}点护盾: Plants gain {value} points of shield when damaged.
关卡开始时，场上所有植物获得{value}点护盾: Plants gain {value} points of shield at the start of a level.
坚果类植物免疫碾压: Defensive plants are now immune to crush.
植物获得护盾时，3×3范围内其他植物获得{value}%的护盾: When a plant gains a shield, other plants in a 3×3 area gain a {value}% shield.
植物受到治疗时，获得{value}%相当于治疗量的护盾: When a plant is healed, it gains a shield equal to {value}% of the healing amount.
植物回血不再受到血量上限的限制: Healing to plants is no longer limited by their max HP.
场上护盾值最高的植物无敌（免疫伤害和碾压）: The plant with the highest shield is invincible (immune to damage and crush).
每拥有1个寒冰词条，寒冷状态的减速效果+{value}%，激活暴风雪效果: For each Glacies modifier, the slowing factor from Chill increases by {value}% and the Blizzard effect is activated.
植物死亡时会对小范围内的僵尸施加1秒冻结: When a plant dies, it freezes nearby zombies for 1s.
僵尸被冻结后，下次受到的伤害增加{value}%: After being frozen, zombies take {value}% increased damage from the next hit.
僵尸被冻结时，对小范围内的僵尸施加寒冷状态: When a zombie is frozen, nearby zombies are inflicted with Chill.
无防具的僵尸受到伤害后有{value}%概率被寒冷减速: Zombies without armor have a {value}% chance to be inflicted with Chill when damaged.
僵尸在解除冻结时受到{value}伤害: Frozen zombies take {value} damage when they thaw.
僵尸的冻结值上限始终为{value}: Zombies' maximum Cryo Value is always {value}.
每拥有1个魅惑词条，魅惑僵尸的血量和伤害+{value}%，激活逆转效果: For each Hypnos modifier, the max HP and damage of hypnotized zombies increase by {value}% and the Turnabout effect is activated.
魅惑僵尸啃咬同类型僵尸时，造成的伤害增加{value}%: Hypnotized zombies deal {value}% more damage when biting zombies of the same type.
魅惑僵尸啃咬僵尸时，有{value}%概率魅惑目标: Hypnotized zombies have a {value}% chance to hypnotize their target when biting.
僵尸被魅惑后，获得{value}%生命值加成: Zombies gain {value}% bonus HP when hypnotized.
被魅惑僵尸啃咬到的僵尸，受到的伤害增加{value}%: Zombies bitten by hypnotized zombies take {value}% increased damage.
魅惑僵尸免疫碾压: Hypnotized zombies are immune to crush.
僵尸死亡后，有{value}%概率复活并为你而战: When a zombie dies, it has a {value}% chance to revive hypnotized.
每过{value}秒，生成一列魅惑盲盒僵尸为你而战: Every {value} seconds, a column of hypnotized Mystery-box Zombies is summoned.
魅惑僵尸造成的碾压伤害增加{value}%: Hypnotized zombies deal {value}% increased crushing damage.
魅惑僵尸死亡后，有{value}%概率魅惑附近的同类型僵尸: When a hypnotized zombie dies, it has a {value}% chance to hypnotize nearby zombies of the same type.
每拥有1个烈焰词条，植物的攻击力增加{value}%，激活火球效果: For each Ignis modifier, plants attack gain {value}% attack damage and the Fireball effect is activated.
红温的僵尸死亡时的爆炸伤害提高{value}%: Enflamed zombies deal {value}% more explosive damage on death.
僵尸的冻结状态被火焰效果解除时，受到{value}伤害: Zombies take {value} damage when their Frozen state is removed by fire effects.
僵尸的红温亡语会额外释放辣椒火焰: Enflamed zombies release additional Jalapeno effect upon death.
辣椒火焰燃烧时，为本行植物回复{value}生命值: Jalapeno effects heal plants in the same for {value} HP.
辣椒火焰燃尽时，有{value}概率对本行僵尸施加冻结状态: Jalapeno effects have a {value}% chance to Freeze the surviving zombies.
僵尸化为灰烬时，会削减全场僵尸{value}%韧性: Zombies when cremated lower the max HP of all zombies by {value}%.
卡牌冷却速度增加{value}%: Increases Seed Packet recharge speed by {value}%.
植物可种植上限增加{value}: Increases the Max number of Plants by {value}.
5关后超极植物可种植上限每过1关增加{value}: After 5 levels, increases the Max number of Advanced Fusions by {value} every level.
10关后究极植物可种植上限每过1关增加{value}: After 10 levels, increases the Max number of Odyssey Fusions by {value} every level.
词条刷新次数-{value}，但偶数关可以多选1个: Modifier Reroll Times -{value}, but you can pick 1 more on odd-numbered levels.
随机获得2个未拥有的词条: Randomly receive 2 Modifiers you do not already own.
可以通过长按来取下时停按钮，用以敲打僵尸并将其“时停”: Hold the Slow Mode button to pick it up, allowing you to hit zombies and put them into Stasis.
可以使用手套点击植物自身来升级: Click on a plant while holding it with the Glove to upgrade it.
每拥有1个蒜毒词条，僵尸受到的伤害增加{value}%，激活腐化效果: For each Toxicus modifier, zombies take {value}% more damage and the Corruption effect is activated.
僵尸每有一层蒜毒，受到的伤害增加{value}%: For each stack of Poison on a zombie, the damage it takes increases by {value}%.
僵尸受到的毒伤增加{value}%: Increases Poison damage dealt to zombies by {value}%.
僵尸每受到1点毒伤，为全场血量比例最低的植物回复1点生命值: For every 1 point of poison damage dealt to zombies, heal the plant with the lowest HP percentage by 1 HP.
中毒的僵尸在啃咬时有{value}%概率把自己作为啃咬目标: Poisoned zombies have a {value}% chance to target themselves when biting.
僵尸换行时会进入中毒状态并叠加5层蒜值: Zombies changing lanes are immediately Poisoned and gain 5 Poison points.
中毒的僵尸在换行时受到{value}伤害: Poisoned zombies take {value} damage when changing lanes.
僵尸持续中毒10秒后，每秒损失{value}%最大生命值: Zombies lose {value}% of their max HP per second after 10s of being Poisoned.
僵尸的蒜值层数上限+{value}: Increases the max Poison point stacks on zombies by {value}.
赋予蒜值的行为会施加中毒状态: Any attack that applies Poison point inflicts Poisoned.
